bundle.shortDescription: Browse, edit, and manage notes offline
bundle.longDescription: OpenNotes Desktop is a cross-platform desktop application that connects to the OpenNotes API for browsing educational notes. Features include a built-in Markdown/LaTeX editor, offline storage, and note management tools.
